overview: Candy magnate Herschel Savage finds himself in the middle of a whole lot of dirty dealings in this raucous romp. Savage plays the owner of a chocolate company, but lately he's been running up against more than his fair share of problems. His wife Lois Ayres is trying to seduce their own son, his ex-wife is financing a rival chocolate company with his alimony payments, and he's finding himself increasingly attracted to Nina Hartley, the daughter of the rival chocolatier. As if that weren't enough to give a candyman a headache, now it seems that the rival Harlem Candy Company has introduced an aphrodisiac element into their chocolates, making them even more in demand throughout the city.
tagline: Uptown Tarts Were Never So Sweet!
title: Harlem Candy
